Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

12  KSGeoSpace::KSGeoSpace() :
13  fContents(),
14  fCommands()

18  KSComponent(),
19  fContents( aCopy.fContents ),
20  fCommands( aCopy.fCommands )

24  {

31  void KSGeoSpace::Enter() const
32  {
33  geomsg_debug( "enter geo space <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom )
34  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
35  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
36  {
37  (*tCommandIt)->Activate();
38  }
39  return;
40  }
41  void KSGeoSpace::Exit() const
42  {
43  geomsg_debug( "exit geo space <" << this->GetName() << ">" << eom )
44  vector< KSCommand* >::reverse_iterator tCommandIt;
45  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.rbegin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.rend(); tCommandIt++ )
46  {
47  (*tCommandIt)->Deactivate();
48  }
49  return;
50  }
51 
52  bool KSGeoSpace::Outside( const KThreeVector& aPoint ) const
53  {
54  bool tOutside;
55  vector< KGSpace* >::const_iterator tSpace;
56 
57  for( tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
58  {
59  tOutside = (*tSpace)->Outside( aPoint );
60  if( tOutside == true )
61  {
62  return true;
63  }
64  }
65 
66  return false;
67  }
68 
69  KThreeVector KSGeoSpace::Point( const KThreeVector& aPoint ) const
70  {
71  double tDistance;
72  KThreeVector tPoint;
73  vector< KGSpace* >::const_iterator tSpace;
74 
75  double tNearestDistance = std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
76  KThreeVector tNearestPoint;
77 
78  for( tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
79  {
80  tPoint = (*tSpace)->Point( aPoint );
81  tDistance = (tPoint - aPoint).Magnitude();
82  if( tDistance < tNearestDistance )
83  {
84  tNearestDistance = tDistance;
85  tNearestPoint = tPoint;
86  }
87  }
88 
89  return tNearestPoint;
90  }
91  KThreeVector KSGeoSpace::Normal( const KThreeVector& aPoint ) const
92  {
93  double tDistance;
94  KThreeVector tPoint;
95  vector< KGSpace* >::const_iterator tSpace;
96 
97  double tNearestDistance = std::numeric_limits< double >::max();
98  const KGSpace* tNearestSpace = NULL;
99 
100  for( tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
101  {
102  tPoint = (*tSpace)->Point( aPoint );
103  tDistance = (tPoint - aPoint).Magnitude();
104  if( tDistance < tNearestDistance )
105  {
106  tNearestDistance = tDistance;
107  tNearestSpace = (*tSpace);
108  }
109  }
110 
111  if (tNearestSpace != NULL)
112  return tNearestSpace->Normal( aPoint );
113 
114  geomsg( eWarning ) << "geo space <" << GetName() << "> could not find a nearest space to position " << aPoint << eom;
115  return KThreeVector::sInvalid;
116  }
117 
118  void KSGeoSpace::AddContent( KGSpace* aSpace )
119  {
120  vector< KGSpace* >::iterator tSpace;
121  for( tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
122  {
123  if( (*tSpace) == aSpace )
124  {
125  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"space <"<<aSpace->GetName()<<"> was already added to geo space <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
126  return;
127  }
128  }
129  fContents.push_back( aSpace );
130  return;
131  }
132  void KSGeoSpace::RemoveContent( KGSpace* aSpace )
133  {
134  vector< KGSpace* >::iterator tSpace;
135  for( tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
136  {
137  if( (*tSpace) == aSpace )
138  {
139  fContents.erase( tSpace );
140  return;
141  }
142  }
143  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"can not remove space <"<<aSpace->GetName()<<">, as it was not found in geo space <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
144  return;
145  }
146  vector< KGSpace* > KSGeoSpace::GetContent()
147  {
148  return fContents;
149  }
150 
151  void KSGeoSpace::AddCommand( KSCommand* anCommand )
152  {
153  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommand;
154  for( tCommand = fCommands.begin(); tCommand != fCommands.end(); tCommand++ )
155  {
156  if( (*tCommand) == anCommand )
157  {
158  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"command <"<<anCommand->GetName()<<"> was already added to geo space <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
159  return;
160  }
161  }
162  fCommands.push_back( anCommand );
163  return;
164  }
165  void KSGeoSpace::RemoveCommand( KSCommand* anCommand )
166  {
167  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommand;
168  for( tCommand = fCommands.begin(); tCommand != fCommands.end(); tCommand++ )
169  {
170  if( (*tCommand) == anCommand )
171  {
172  fCommands.erase( tCommand );
173  return;
174  }
175  }
176  geomsg( eWarning ) <<"can not remove command <"<<anCommand->GetName()<<">, as it was not found in geo space <" << this->GetName() <<">"<<eom;
177  return;
178  }
179 
180  void KSGeoSpace::InitializeComponent()
181  {
182  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
183  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
184  {
185  (*tCommandIt)->GetParent()->Initialize();
186  (*tCommandIt)->GetChild()->Initialize();
187  }
188 
189  vector< KSSpace* >::iterator tKSSpaceIt;
190  for( tKSSpaceIt = fSpaces.begin(); tKSSpaceIt != fSpaces.end(); tKSSpaceIt++ )
191  {
192  (*tKSSpaceIt)->Initialize();
193  }
194  vector< KSSurface* >::iterator tKSSurfaceIt;
195  for( tKSSurfaceIt = fSurfaces.begin(); tKSSurfaceIt != fSurfaces.end(); tKSSurfaceIt++ )
196  {
197  (*tKSSurfaceIt)->Initialize();
198  }
199  vector< KSSide* >::iterator tKSSideIt;
200  for( tKSSideIt = fSides.begin(); tKSSideIt != fSides.end(); tKSSideIt++ )
201  {
202  (*tKSSideIt)->Initialize();
203 
204  //check if navigation sides are really geometric boundaries of volumes
205  KSGeoSide* tGeoSide = dynamic_cast<KSGeoSide* >( (*tKSSideIt) );
206  if ( tGeoSide != NULL )
207  {
208  vector< KGSurface* > tSideSurfaces = tGeoSide->GetContent();
209 
210  for( vector< KGSurface* >::const_iterator tSideSurface = tSideSurfaces.begin(); tSideSurface != tSideSurfaces.end(); tSideSurface++ )
211  {
212 
213  for( vector< KGSpace* >::const_iterator tSpace = fContents.begin(); tSpace != fContents.end(); tSpace++ )
214  {
215  bool tValid = false;
216 
217  const vector< KGSurface* >* tSurfaces = (*tSpace)->GetBoundaries();
218 
219  for( vector< KGSurface* >::const_iterator tSurface = tSurfaces->begin(); tSurface != tSurfaces->end(); tSurface++ )
220  {
221  if ( *(tSideSurface) == *(tSurface) )
222  {
223  tValid = true;
224  }
225  }
226 
227  if ( tValid == false )
228  {
229  geomsg( eError ) <<"geo_side <" <<(*tSideSurface)->GetName()<<"> is not a geometic boundary of space <"<<(*tSpace)->GetName()<<">, check your navigation configuration"<<eom;
230  }
231  }
232  }
233  }
234  }
235 
236  return;
237  }
238  void KSGeoSpace::DeinitializeComponent()
239  {
240  vector< KSCommand* >::iterator tCommandIt;
241  for( tCommandIt = fCommands.begin(); tCommandIt != fCommands.end(); tCommandIt++ )
242  {
243  (*tCommandIt)->GetParent()->Deinitialize();
244  (*tCommandIt)->GetChild()->Deinitialize();
245  }
246 
247  vector< KSSpace* >::iterator tGeoSpaceIt;
248  for( tGeoSpaceIt = fSpaces.begin(); tGeoSpaceIt != fSpaces.end(); tGeoSpaceIt++ )
249  {
250  (*tGeoSpaceIt)->Deinitialize();
251  }
252  vector< KSSurface* >::iterator tGeoSurfaceIt;
253  for( tGeoSurfaceIt = fSurfaces.begin(); tGeoSurfaceIt != fSurfaces.end(); tGeoSurfaceIt++ )
254  {
255  (*tGeoSurfaceIt)->Deinitialize();
256  }
257  vector< KSSide* >::iterator tGeoSideIt;
258  for( tGeoSideIt = fSides.begin(); tGeoSideIt != fSides.end(); tGeoSideIt++ )
259  {
260  (*tGeoSideIt)->Deinitialize();
261  }
262 
263  return;
264  }
265
